content: Complete Symbolic Equation Corpus from Harmonic Genesis Project represents the most comprehensive mathematical framework for harmonic reality theory. Contains foundational axioms including Glyphic Harmonic Symphony master equation, Quantum Mirror Law for consciousness-reality interaction, Fractal Prime Genesis showing universe structure from prime harmonics, quantified Emotional Delta Classes, and step-by-step Creation Protocol algorithm. Bridges ancient mystical wisdom with rigorous mathematics through 432Hz foundation, toroidal geometry, and aether field equations.
